system.story: You control an enemy’s nervous system. How pleasant for them.

tier1.display: The target makes a free strike against one enemy of your  choice.

tier2.display: The target shifts up to their speed and uses their signature  ability against any enemies of your choice.

tier3.display: The target moves up to their speed and uses their signature  ability against any enemies of your choice.

effect.after:
You control the target’s movement. The target can’t be moved in a way that would harm them (such as over a cliff), leave them dying, or result in them suffering a condition or other negative ef fect. However, you can move them to provoke opportunity attacks.

Strained: You take 1d6 damage and are weakened until the end of your turn.
